item.title: What to expect at OpenAI’s DevDay 2025, and how to watch it

item.title: Can you think like a YC partner? This game will help you find out
item.description: The YC Partner Simulator game, created by an undergrad in Berlin, lets you see if you can predict which startups get into Y Combinator.
